library(htmltools)
library(emoji)

leaf <- function(name, link, desc, space) {
  paste0(
    " ",
    as.character(a(name, href = link)),
    strrep(" ", space),
    "- ",
    desc
  )
}

header <- function(emoji, text) {
  res <- glue::glue(":{emoji}: <b>{text}</b>")
  emoji_glue(res)
}
